svcsubproc.title: Entry Dash Board Panels
svcsubproc.para: The entry dash panel, switch panels and driver storage panels are all constructed of form steel panels. All panels assemble together to make a clean fully functional assembly.

The design of the dash area enhances visibility and functionality for ease of operation, with the ergonomically designed panels. All panels are removable for access to the components and assemblies in the driver control area ( Figure 50). To remove the dash panels follow the procedures as listed.

figure.caption: Figure 143. Passenger Side Entry Panel Section

calloutgroup.callout1: PASSENGER ENTRY TOP PANEL MOUNTING SCREWS

step2.para: Beginning at the passenger entry door and step well, locate the dash panel mounting bolts along the leading edge of the step well panel at the lower section of the windshield glass and seal.
Loosen and remove the panel mounting bolts.
Locate the panel lower edge mounting screws the secure the panel to the entry panel or step well heater panel (if equipped). Loosen and remove the mounting screws.
With the mounting screws and bolts removed, lift the step well panel cover upward and out.
